t24:applications.name: MF_ORDER_BY_CUST
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B C D E H I L P Q R S V

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Indicates the order number
Identifies the Customer for the transaction.
Indicates Id of the fund to be subscribed.
Indicates currency of the fund
Indicates Account Officer responsible
Agent through whom the order is being placed
Indicates the Transaction Type
Credit transaction type if Order Type is Switch
Debit transaction type if Order Type is Switch
Currency in which the order is being placed.
Indicates whether the fees is waived or not.
The order amount is inclusive of fee or not,
Credit transaction ID for redemptions
Indicates the Limit Type
Mode of payment like account, cash, cheque etc.
Cheque no, if payment is through cheque.
Identifies date of the cheque.
Identifies the bank on which the cheque is drawn.
Identifies the cheque amount.
Credit card number, if payment mode is card.
Identifies the expiry date of the card.
Identifies the bank which issued the card.
Identifes the amount of payment made by card
Indicates the amount of cash payment received
Identifies the cash receipt no
Identifies the date of cash payment
Account from which customer makes payment
The external account no held by the customer
Indicates the external account currency
Bank with which external account is maintained
Branch of the bank holding the external account
Positions to be automatically selected or not
Percentage of existing holdings to be redeemed
Whether the bulk allocation is amount/percentage
Fund Id subscribed or redeemed by customer
Share of fund to be ordered in terms of percentage
Holds the bulk order amount.
Holds customer settlement account .
Holds Settlement currency for the transaction.
Specifies type of order - Price or Market order
Specifies the price cap for the order.
Transaction towards which redemption is allocated
Trigger for allocating various funds
Fund Id from which the customer wishes to switch
The percentage of the holdings to be switched
Fund Id to which the customer wishes to switch
Auto Select is Yes used to calculate order amount
Indicates the type of the plan like SIP, SWP etc.
Specifies the plan amount
Specifies the plan percent
For SIP for debiting available cash for investment
Indicates balance to be retained in the account
The cash balance is in terms of amount or percent
Specifies the start date of the plan
Specifies the frequency of the plan
Specifies the plan execution date
Specifies the end date of the plan
Send confirmation - Y/N ?
Additional information defined locally
Overrides generated by this transaction
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Auditor Code
Date and time when record was audited
